```{r}
TRAIN_FILE_NAME = 'Ames_data.csv'
TEST_FILE_NAME = 'test.csv'

train_data = read.csv(TRAIN_FILE_NAME)
train_data = train_data[, colnames(train_data) != 'PID']

numericVars = which(sapply(train_data, is.numeric))
factorVars = which(sapply(train_data, is.factor))
```

Build random forest model
```{r}
library(randomForest)

rfModel = randomForest(Sale_Price ~ ., data = train_data, importance = T, ntree=400); 
```

Ridge with lambda.min/lambda.1se (R_min, R_1se)
```{r}
X = train_data[, colnames(train_data) != 'Sale_Price']
X = model.matrix(~., X)

Y = train_data[, 'Sale_Price']
cv.out = cv.glmnet(X, Y, alpha = 0)
```
